text:
Jack Davis (September 6, 1935 – February 4, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in Chicago. He was a Republican member of the Illinois House of Representatives from 1976 to 1986, and a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from 1987 to 1989 representing Illinois' 4th U.S. Congressional District.
Davis died of dementia in Springfield, Illinois on February 4, 2018 at the age of 82.
